entry.title: An analysis of CVE-2022-21877
entry.summary:
Introduction
I wanted to have some fun on patch diffing : on the latest “patch tuesday” update, Microsoft released a patch for an information disclosure vulnerability in the storage spaces controller. This vulnerability has been found by Quang Linh, working at STAR Labs. Because leaking information is often easier than a full blown RCE/LPE exploit, I selected this vuln because it would take l...

entry.title: Inside Import Address Filtering
entry.summary:
Short Intro and past references
For a course I teach, I wanted to present the modern mitigations one can encounter on Windows. I focused on those aimed at preventing shellcode execution and ROP, because this course was on stack buffer overflows. Namely, the interesting ones are:
Stackpivot CallerCheck SimExec Import Address Filtering (IAF) Export Address Filtering (EAF)
One of my...
